en.GMCM.PageToolTip.0: Options that affect many or all at once.
en.GMCM.PageToolTip.8: Options for Krobus, Wizard, Mermaids & Witch.
en.GMCM.PageToolTip.11: Options for Sam, Vincent, Jodi & Kent.
en.GMCM.PageToolTip.12: Options for Seb, Maru, Robin & Demetrius.
en.GMCM.PageToolTip.15: Options for DSV's additional character packs.
en.GMCM.Options.Variants.ToolTip: Choose which version of {name} you would like to use. 'Vanilla' is the default version from the original game. Select 'off' if you do not want DSV to affect this character in any way. Check the website for more info.
en.GMCM.Options.SingleVariant.ToolTip: Choose whether you would like to use seasonal outfits and other DSV features for {name}. Select 'off' if you do not want DSV to affect this character in any way. Check the website for more info.
en.GMCM.Options.Lightweights.ToolTip: Toggles whether {name} will have the full range of Diverse Stardew Valley's features, a lightweight selection to reduce lag, or an ultra-lightweight selection. Check the website for more info.
en.GMCM.Options.WeddingOutfits.ToolTip: Selects which wedding outfit {name} will wear when getting married. 1 is the default outfit from previous versions of DSV. Check the website for more info. Can't be used if a character's LightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.MapEdits.ToolTip: Selects whether characters will have immersive cultural edits made to their houses to match their modded variants. Most options do nothing if a character's vanilla variant is selected.
en.GMCM.Options.Dialogue.ToolTip: Toggles whether characters will have new and edited dialogue related to {name}'s DSV variant(s).
en.GMCM.Options.Vanilla.Name: Vanilla
en.GMCM.Options.Modded.Name: Modded
en.GMCM.Options.Off.Name: Off
en.GMCM.Options.Full.Name: Full
en.GMCM.Options.Light.Name: Light
en.GMCM.Options.Ultralight.Name: Ultralight
en.GMCM.Options.Always.Name: Always
en.GMCM.Options.MermaidPendantsSpouse.Name: Mermaid Pendants - Spouses
en.GMCM.Options.MermaidPendantsSpouse.ToolT: Toggles whether or not your fiance/spouse will wear a mermaid pendant after getting engaged or married. Can't be used if a character's LightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.MermaidPendantsRivals.Name: Mermaid Pendants - Rival Hearts
en.GMCM.Options.MermaidPendantsRivals.ToolT: Toggles whether or not rival heart couples (mod-added relationships between NPCs) will wear a mermaid pendant after getting married. Can't be used if a character's LightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.MermaidPendantsCanon.Name: Mermaid Pendants - Canon Couples
en.GMCM.Options.MermaidPendantsCanon.ToolTi: Toggles whether or not canon married couples such as George and Evelyn will wear mermaid pendants. Can't be used if a character's LightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.TownRamps.Name: Town Ramps
en.GMCM.Options.TownRamps.ToolTip: Changes several sets of stairs in Pelican Town to ramps for better wheelchair accessibility.
en.GMCM.Options.MaternitySprites.Name: Maternity Sprites
en.GMCM.Options.MaternitySprites.ToolTip: Enables maternity outfits for your wife while she is pregnant. If set to 'true', the sprites will automatically change. Can't be used if a character's LightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight'. Doesn't affect Penny or Leah's Butch variant.
en.GMCM.Options.GiftTastesChange.Name: Gift Tastes Change
en.GMCM.Options.GiftTastesChange.ToolTip: Changes gift tastes for modded Sandy, Gus, and Jodi, Omani Kent, Sikh Harvey, and Jewish Elliott, Alex, Evelyn, and George to dislike food items that conflict with their dietary requirements. Sam, Vincent, and vanilla Kent or Jodi will also have changes if modded Jodi or Omani Kent is enabled. Doesn't affect their vanilla variants except for Sam, Vincent, Jodi and/or Kent. This option is on by default but can be disabled for compatibility with other mods.
en.GMCM.Options.Pyjamas.Name: Pyjamas
en.GMCM.Options.Pyjamas.ToolTip: Toggles whether or not marriage candidates will wear pyjamas in the morning and evening. If 'Marriage Only' is selected, they will only wear them in the farmhouse once married. Can only be used if a character's LightweightConfig option is set to 'full'.
en.GMCM.Options.On.Name: On
en.GMCM.Options.Marriage.Name: Marriage Only
en.GMCM.Options.FlowerQueensCrown.Name: Flower Queen's Crown
en.GMCM.Options.FlowerQueensCrown.ToolTip: Enables the Flower Queen's Crown feature, which gives other NPCs besides Haley a chance to be Flower Queen during the Flower Dance. Any characters set to 'ultralight' or 'off' will not be added as potential Flower Queen candidates. Check the website for more info.
en.GMCM.Options.FlowerQueensCrownImmersionM: Toggles whether the Flower Queen's Crown feature will initially restrict who can become the Flower Queen and expand over time, or whether any eligible candidates can be selected as Flower Queen from Year 1. Check the website for more info.
en.GMCM.Options.BeachStyle.Name: Vanilla Beach Style
en.GMCM.Options.BeachStyle.ToolTip: Changes Ginger Island swimwear to use the vanilla design, a new design by DSV, or randomly select between both. RandomBeachwear can't be used if a character's LightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.DSVStyle.Name: DSV Style
en.GMCM.Options.VanillaStyle.Name: Vanilla Style
en.GMCM.Options.RandomBeachwear.Name: Random Beachwear
en.GMCM.Title.RidgesideVillage.Name: Ridgeside Village (RSV)
en.GMCM.Options.RSVBert.Name: Bert
en.GMCM.Options.RSVBert.ToolTip: Adds compatible portraits and sprites for Ridgeside Village's Bert, so that he is Filipino to match his cousin Caroline's modded DSV variant.
en.GMCM.Options.RSVTrinnie.Name: Trinnie
en.GMCM.Options.RSVTrinnie.ToolTip: Adds compatible portraits and sprites for Ridgeside Village's Trinnie, so that she is mixed Filipino-German to match her aunt Caroline's modded DSV variant. A black-haired or green-haired version is available.
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedGreen.Name: Modded Green
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedDark.Name: Modded Dark
en.GMCM.Options.RSVLenny.Name: Lenny
en.GMCM.Options.RSVLenny.ToolTip: Adds compatible portraits and sprites for Ridgeside Village's Lenny, so that she is Black to match her brother Lewis's modded DSV variant.
en.GMCM.Title.StardewKidsExpansion.Name: Stardew Kids Expansion (SKE)
en.GMCM.Title.StardewKidsExpansion.ToolTip: Adds compatible portraits and sprites for Stardew Kids Expansion's James, Vanessa, Adrian, Douglas, and Tina, so that they match the modded variants of their family members. Two different artstyles by Medisun or Camtherata are available; check the website for more info.
en.GMCM.Options.SKEJames.Name: James
en.GMCM.Options.SKEVanessa.Name: Vanessa
en.GMCM.Options.SKEAdrian.Name: Adrian
en.GMCM.Options.SKEDouglas.Name: Douglas
en.GMCM.Options.SKETina.Name: Tina
en.GMCM.Title.LessUglyTownInteriors.Name: Less Ugly Town Interiors (LUTI)
en.GMCM.Title.LessUglyTownInteriors.ToolTip: Adds DSV's variant-specific map edits to LUTI's custom rooms for Sandy and Willy.
en.GMCM.Options.LUTIWilly.Name: Willy
en.GMCM.Options.LUTISandy.Name: Sandy
en.GMCM.Title.LookingForLove.Name: Looking For Love (LFL)
en.GMCM.Title.LookingForLove.ToolTip: Adds compatibility with foggywizard's Looking For Love so that LfL's dateable characters will match DSV's variants and have seasonal outfits. Only check a character's option if you also have them set to dateable in LfL's configuration options.
en.GMCM.Options.LookingForLove.Name: LookingForLove
en.GMCM.Options.LFLPam.Name: Pam
en.GMCM.Options.LFLWilly.Name: Willy
en.GMCM.Options.LFLGus.Name: Gus
en.GMCM.Options.LFLWizard.Name: Wizard
en.GMCM.Options.LFLLinus.Name: Linus
en.GMCM.Options.LFLLewis.Name: Lewis
en.GMCM.Options.LFLSandy.Name: Sandy
en.GMCM.Options.LFLMarnie.Name: Marnie
en.GMCM.Options.LFLClint.Name: Clint
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedCamtherata.Name: Modded Camtherata
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedMedisun.Name: Modded Medisun
en.GMCM.Title.MGR.Name: Make Gunther Real
en.GMCM.Options.AlternateCecily.Name: Alternate Cecily
en.GMCM.Options.AlternateCecily.ToolTip: Toggles whether or not Gunther's daughter Cecily will use alternate sprites & portraits by Airyn that match DSV's Gunther. Set to false if you prefer Cecily's original art. Only applicable if using Make Gunther Real.
en.GMCM.Title.Mike.Name: College Boy Mike
en.GMCM.Options.TurkishMike.Name: Turkish Mike
en.GMCM.Options.TurkishMike.ToolTip: Toggles whether or not Gus's nephew Mike will use alternate sprites & portraits by Airyn that match DSV's Gus. Requires GusVariant to be set to 'Modded'. Set to false if you prefer Mike's original art. Only applicable if using College Boy Mike.
en.GMCM.Title.Jaemin.Name: NPC Park Jaemin
en.GMCM.Options.JaeminSamFamilyDialogue.Too: Toggles whether or not Jaemin will add dialogue for Sam and his family related to Jaemin being from Gotoro. Match this setting to the equivalent option in Jaemin's config.
en.GMCM.Title.AGECompatibility.Name: Adventurers Guild Expanded (AGE)
en.GMCM.Title.AGECompatibility.ToolTip: Adds compatible portraits and sprites for Adventurers Guild Expanded's Daisy, Gabriel and/or Zinnia, so that they are Mongolian to match Marlon's modded DSV variant.
en.GMCM.Options.AGEGabriel.Name: Gabriel
en.GMCM.Options.AGEZinnia.Name: Zinnia
en.GMCM.Options.AGEDaisy.Name: Daisy
en.GMCM.Options.MarlonCompatibility.Name: Marlon Compatibility
en.GMCM.Options.MarlonCompatibility.ToolTip: Toggles which mod will edit Marlon's portraits and sprites. The default 'Automatic' should automatically match the appropriate mod, but if this is not working, this option allows for a manual selection.
en.GMCM.Options.Automatic.Name: Automatic
en.GMCM.Options.MakeMarlonReal.Name: MakeMarlonReal
en.GMCM.Options.Denver.Name: Denver
en.GMCM.Title.SpousePortraitsReworked.Name: Spouse Portraits Reworked
en.GMCM.Options.TonedDown.Name: Toned-Down Portraits
en.GMCM.Options.TonedDown.ToolTip: Toggles whether spouse portraits will have a toned-down color scheme, matching the PortraitRecolor option from the original mod.
en.GMCM.Options.EmilyPortrait.Name: Emily Spouse Portrait
en.GMCM.Options.EmilyPortrait.ToolTip: Chooses whether to use option 1 or option 2 for Emily's spouse portrait. Check the website for more info.
en.GMCM.Options.WizardPortrait.Name: Wizard Spouse Portrait
en.GMCM.Options.WizardPortrait.ToolTip: Chooses whether to use option 1 or option 2 for Rasmodius's spouse portrait. Requires Romanceable Rasmodius - Updated. Check the website for more info.
Selects whether or not DSV will include additional daily dialogue lines related to a character's modded variant. If false, this option will disable daily dialogue for all characters except for dialogue connected to the No More War Dialogue Edits config option.
en.GMCM.Options.NoMoreWarDialogueEdits.Name: No More War Dialogue Edits
en.GMCM.Options.NoMoreWarDialogueEdits.Tool: Changes dialogue about Kent's profession and the war as an expansion of ShotFromGun's No More War - Kent as Journalist. This content automatically applies and cannot be turned off if using Kent's Omani or OmaniDisabled variants. It can be used with no mod requirement if using Jodi's modded variant or requires ShotFromGun's mod if using Jodi's vanilla variant. Check the website for more info.
en.GMCM.Title.NPCDialogue.Name: Individual NPC Dialogue Toggles

en.GMCM.Options.AlexDialogue.Name: Alex

en.GMCM.Title.AbigailMainOptions.Name: Main Options
en.GMCM.Options.AbigailVariant.Name: Abigail Variant
en.GMCM.Options.AbigailVariant.ToolTip: Choose which version of Abigail you would like to use. 'VanillaStraightSize' is the default version from the original game. Select 'off' if you do not want DSV to affect this character in any way. Check the website for more info.
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedPlusSize.Name: Modded Plus Size
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedStraightSize.Name: Modded Straight Size
en.GMCM.Options.VanillaPlusSize.Name: Vanilla Plus Size
en.GMCM.Options.VanillaStraightSize.Name: Vanilla Straight Size
en.GMCM.Options.CarolineVariant.Name: Caroline Variant
en.GMCM.Options.PierreVariant.Name: Pierre Variant
en.GMCM.Title.AbigailAdditionalOptions.Name: Additional Options
en.GMCM.Options.AbigailWeddingOutfit.Name: Abigail Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.SeedShopEdits.Name: Pierre's Shop Edits
en.GMCM.Options.NonbinaryAbigail.Name: Nonbinary Abigail
en.GMCM.Options.NonbinaryAbigail.ToolTip: Selects whether or not DSV will include additional dialogue lines for Abigail discussing a nonbinary gender identity.
en.GMCM.Options.AbigailGothMakeup.Name: Abigail Goth Makeup
en.GMCM.Options.AbigailGothMakeup.ToolTip: Chooses whether Abigail will always wear goth makeup, will never wear makeup, or will dynamically wear goth makeup, regular makeup, or no makeup depending on the day. Can only be used if AbigailLightweightConfig is not set to 'ultralight', and only 'Always' is available if AbigailLightweightConfig is set to 'light'.
en.GMCM.Title.AlexMainOptions.Name: Main Options
en.GMCM.Options.AlexVariant.Name: Alex Variant
en.GMCM.Options.Mexican.Name: Mexican
en.GMCM.Options.Samoan.Name: Samoan
en.GMCM.Options.AlexLightweightConfig.Name: Alex Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.EvelynVariant.Name: Evelyn Variant
en.GMCM.Options.GeorgeVariant.Name: George Variant
en.GMCM.Title.AlexAdditionalOptions.Name: Additional Options
en.GMCM.Options.AlexWeddingOutfit.Name: Alex Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.AlexTattoos.Name: Alex Tattoos
en.GMCM.Options.AlexTattoos.ToolTip: Chooses whether or not Alex's Samoan variant has traditional chest and shoulder tattoos.
en.GMCM.Options.GeorgeBeard.Name: George Beard
en.GMCM.Options.GeorgeBeard.ToolTip: Chooses whether George is bearded or clean-shaven. The dynamic option makes him bearded during fall and winter. Can only be used if GeorgeLightweightConfig is not set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.Beard.Name: Beard
en.GMCM.Options.NoBeard.Name: No Beard
en.GMCM.Options.Dynamic.Name: Dynamic
en.GMCM.Options.GeorgeEvelynSpiritsEve.Name: George & Evelyn At Spirit's Eve
en.GMCM.Options.GeorgeEvelynSpiritsEve.Tool: Chooses whether or not George & Evelyn will attend the Spirit's Eve festival, as they do not attend in vanilla.
en.GMCM.Options.JoshHouseEdits.Name: Alex's House Edits
en.GMCM.Options.JewishMullners.Name: Jewish Mullners
en.GMCM.Options.JewishMullners.ToolTip: Chooses whether the Mullner family are Jewish, in addition to their character variant. This option adds dialogue and visual edits.
Chooses whether the Mullner family are Jewish, in addition to their character variant. This option adds schedule edits.
en.GMCM.Title.EmilyMainOptions.Name: Main Options
en.GMCM.Options.EmilyVariant.Name: Emily Variant
en.GMCM.Options.Black.Name: Black
en.GMCM.Options.Romani.Name: Romani
en.GMCM.Options.EmilyLightweightConfig.Name: Emily Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.HaleyVariant.Name: Haley Variant
en.GMCM.Options.HaleyLightweightConfig.Name: Haley Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.SandyVariant.Name: Sandy Variant
en.GMCM.Options.SandyLightweightConfig.Name: Sandy Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Title.EmilyAdditionalOptions.Name: Additional Options
en.GMCM.Options.HoHHaley.Name: Hard-of-Hearing Haley
en.GMCM.Options.HoHHaley.ToolTip: Selects whether or not Haley is partially deaf. If this option is enabled, Haley will wear hearing aids, sometimes use sign language, and have additional dialogue related to her disability.
en.GMCM.Options.NonbinaryEmily.Name: Nonbinary Emily
en.GMCM.Options.NonbinaryEmily.ToolTip: Selects whether or not DSV will include additional dialogue lines for Emily discussing a nonbinary gender identity.
en.GMCM.Options.EmilyTattoos.Name: Emily Tattoos
en.GMCM.Options.EmilyTattoos.ToolTip: Chooses whether or not Emily has colorful tattoos. Can only be used if EmilyLightweightConfig is set to 'full'.
en.GMCM.Options.HaleyCamera.Name: Haley Camera
en.GMCM.Options.HaleyCamera.ToolTip: Changes Haley's camera from brown to black. Can't be used if HaleyLightweightConfig is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.HaleyPiercings.Name: Haley Piercings
en.GMCM.Options.HaleyPiercings.ToolTip: Chooses whether or not Haley has nose and eyebrow piercings. Can't be used if HaleyLightweightConfig is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.HaleyCuffs.Name: Haley Cuffs
en.GMCM.Options.HaleyCuffs.ToolTip: Chooses whether or not Haley's Black variant has hair cuffs in her braids. This option does not affect Vanilla or Romani Haley.
en.GMCM.Options.EmilyWeddingOutfit.Name: Emily Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.HaleyWeddingOutfit.Name: Haley Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.HaleyHouseEdits.Name: Haley & Emily's House Edits
en.GMCM.Title.HarveyMainOptions.Name: Main Options
en.GMCM.Options.HarveyVariant.Name: Harvey Variant
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedNonSikh.Name: Modded Non-Sikh
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedSikh.Name: Modded Sikh
en.GMCM.Options.LewisVariant.Name: Lewis Variant
en.GMCM.Options.LewisLightweightConfig.Name: Lewis Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.GusVariant.Name: Gus Variant
en.GMCM.Options.GusLightweightConfig.Name: Gus Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Title.HarveyAdditionalOptions.Name: Additional Options
en.GMCM.Options.AroAceGus.Name: Aro-Ace Gus
en.GMCM.Options.AroAceGus.ToolTip: Selects whether or not DSV will include additional dialogue lines for Gus discussing being aromantic-asexual.
en.GMCM.Options.HarveyCharacterMoustache.To: Gives Harvey's character/overworld sprite a moustache to match his portraits. Only affects his Vanilla variant.
en.GMCM.Options.HarveyWeddingOutfit.Name: Harvey Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.HarveyRoomEdits.Name: Harvey's Room Edits
en.GMCM.Options.SaloonEdits.Name: Stardrop Saloon Edits
en.GMCM.Options.ManorHouseEdits.Name: Lewis' Manor Edits

en.GMCM.Options.Native.Name: Native American
en.GMCM.Options.Butch.Name: Butch
en.GMCM.Options.LeahLightweightConfig.Name: Leah Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.ElliottVariant.Name: Elliott Variant
en.GMCM.Title.LeahAdditionalOptions.Name: Additional Options
en.GMCM.Options.LeahWeddingOutfit.Name: Leah Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.ElliottWeddingOutfit.Name: Elliott Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.ElliottHouseEdits.Name: Elliott's House Edits
en.GMCM.Options.LeahHouseEdits.Name: Leah's House Edits
en.GMCM.Options.JewishElliott.Name: Jewish Elliott
en.GMCM.Options.JewishElliott.ToolTip: Chooses whether Elliott is Jewish, in addition to his character variant.
en.GMCM.Options.ElliottHelixPiercing.Name: Elliott Accessories - Helix Piercing
en.GMCM.Options.ElliottHelixPiercing.ToolTi: Chooses whether Elliott has a helix piercing in his ear. Can't be used if ElliottLightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.ElliottEarring.Name: Elliott Accessories - Earring
en.GMCM.Options.ElliottEarring.ToolTip: Chooses whether Elliott wears a small hoop earring. Can't be used if ElliottLightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Title.KrobusMainOptions.Name: Main Options
en.GMCM.Options.KrobusVariant.Name: Krobus Variant
en.GMCM.Options.WizardVariant.Name: Wizard Variant
en.GMCM.Options.WitchVariant.Name: Witch Variant
en.GMCM.Options.Mermaids.Name: Mermaids
en.GMCM.Options.Mermaids.ToolTip: Randomizes the appearance of the mermaids who appear in the game. The 'Light Mix' option will change the mermaids to a pre-selected mix. See the website for more details
en.GMCM.Options.RandomUpper.Name: Random Upper
en.GMCM.Options.RandomLower.Name: Random Lower
en.GMCM.Options.RandomBoth.Name: Random Both
en.GMCM.Options.LightMix.Name: Light Mix
en.GMCM.Title.KrobusAdditionalOptions.Name: Additional Options
en.GMCM.Options.WizardFamiliarsHatJunimo.To: Gives the Wizard some spirit familiars who hang around him. Can't be used if WizardLightweightConfig option is set to 'light'.
en.GMCM.Options.WizardFamiliarsShoulderJuni: Gives the Wizard some spirit familiars who hang around him. Can't be used if WizardLightweightConfig option is set to 'light'.
en.GMCM.Options.WizardFamiliarsSpirit.Name: Familiars - Spirit Creature
en.GMCM.Options.WizardFamiliarsSpirit.ToolT: Gives the Wizard some spirit familiars who hang around him. Can't be used if WizardLightweightConfig option is set to 'light'.
en.GMCM.Options.MarlonVariant.Name: Marlon Variant
en.GMCM.Options.GuntherVariant.Name: Gunther Variant
en.GMCM.Options.MorrisVariant.Name: Morris Variant
en.GMCM.Title.PennyMainOptions.Name: Main Options
en.GMCM.Options.PennyVariant.Name: Penny Variant
en.GMCM.Options.Mixed.Name: Mixed
en.GMCM.Options.PennyLightweightConfig.Name: Penny Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.PamVariant.Name: Pam Variant
en.GMCM.Options.PamLightweightConfig.Name: Pam Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Title.PennyAdditionalOptions.Name: Additional Options
en.GMCM.Options.PennyWeddingOutfit.Name: Penny Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.PennyPamDynamicOutfits.Name: Penny & Pam Dynamic Outfits
en.GMCM.Options.PennyPamDynamicOutfits.Tool: Toggles whether Penny & Pam will start with their full wardrobe or start with a limited selection and gain more outfits after story events. If Penny or Pam's LightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight', this option will not affect that character. Check the website for more info.
en.GMCM.Options.PennyFreckles.Name: Penny Freckles
en.GMCM.Options.PennyFreckles.ToolTip: Chooses whether or not Penny's vanilla or mixed variants have freckles, as her ModdedAirynNotsnufffie variants have freckles by default. Can't be used if PennyLightweightConfig is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.TrailerEdits.Name: Penny's House Edits
en.GMCM.Title.SamMainOptions.Name: Main Options
en.GMCM.Options.SamVariant.Name: Sam Variant
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedLighter.Name: Modded Lighter
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedDarker.Name: Modded Darker
en.GMCM.Options.SamLightweightConfig.Name: Sam Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.VincentVariant.Name: Vincent Variant
en.GMCM.Options.JodiVariant.Name: Jodi Variant
en.GMCM.Options.JodiLightweightConfig.Name: Jodi Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.KentVariant.Name: Kent Variant
en.GMCM.Options.Omani.Name: Omani
en.GMCM.Options.OmaniDisabled.Name: Omani Disabled
en.GMCM.Options.VanillaDisabled.Name: Vanilla Disabled
en.GMCM.Options.KentLightweightConfig.Name: Kent Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Title.SamAdditionalOptions.Name: Additional Options
en.GMCM.Options.SamWeddingOutfit.Name: Sam Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.KentNoBombsInMail.Name: Kent No Bombs In Mail
en.GMCM.Options.KentNoBombsInMail.ToolTip: Changes Kent's letters so that he does not post bombs to the player and will instead send other more appropriate items. Automatically applied and cannot be turned off if Kent's Omani or OmaniDisabled variants are enabled, and automatically disabled if Replace Bombs Kent Mail by LiziAnne is installed
en.GMCM.Options.TransSam.Name: Trans Sam
en.GMCM.Options.SamBeard.Name: Sam Beard
en.GMCM.Options.SamBeard.ToolTip: Gives Sam a light beard. This option can be layered with SamStubble. Can't be used if SamLightweightConfig is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.SamStubble.Name: Sam Stubble
en.GMCM.Options.SamStubble.ToolTip: Gives Sam heavy stubble. This option can be layered with SamBeard. Can't be used if SamLightweightConfig is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.SamPiercings.Name: Sam Piercings
en.GMCM.Options.SamPiercings.ToolTip: Gives Sam lip and eyebrow piercings. Can't be used if SamLightweightConfig is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.SamEyes.Name: Sam Eyes
en.GMCM.Options.SamEyes.ToolTip: Keeps Sam's default eye color, changes it to an alternate color, or gives him heterochromia with one eye of each color. Can't be used if SamLightweightConfig is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.Default.Name: Default
en.GMCM.Options.Alternate.Name: Alternate
en.GMCM.Options.Heterochromia.Name: Heterochromia
en.GMCM.Options.SamBinder.Name: Sam Binder
en.GMCM.Options.SamBinder.ToolTip: Gives Sam a tanktop-style binder which is visible when he goes swimming and during some festivals. If disabled, Sam will instead have top surgery scars visible when shirtless.
en.GMCM.Options.SamHouseEdits.Name: Sam's House Edits
en.GMCM.Title.SebastianMainOptions.Name: Main Options
en.GMCM.Options.SebastianVariant.Name: Sebastian Variant
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedBlack.Name: Modded Black
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedPurple.Name: Modded Purple
en.GMCM.Options.MaruVariant.Name: Maru Variant
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedNotSnufffie.Name: Modded NotSnufffie
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedLavender.Name: Modded Lavender
en.GMCM.Options.MaruLightweightConfig.Name: Maru Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.RobinVariant.Name: Robin Variant
en.GMCM.Options.RobinLightweightConfig.Name: Robin Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.DemetriusVariant.Name: Demetrius Variant
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedDarkSkin.Name: Modded Dark Skin
en.GMCM.Options.ModdedAlbino.Name: Modded Albino
en.GMCM.Options.SebastianWeddingOutfit.Name: Sebastian Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.MaruWeddingOutfit.Name: Maru Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.MaruHospitalScrubs.Name: Maru Hospital Scrubs
en.GMCM.Options.MaruHospitalScrubs.ToolTip: Toggles whether Maru wears scrubs when she's working at the clinic or keeps her vanilla nurse's dress.
en.GMCM.Options.MaruCharacterGlasses.Name: Maru Character Glasses
en.GMCM.Options.MaruCharacterGlasses.ToolTi: Gives Maru's character/overworld sprite glasses to match her portraits. Only affects the Vanilla and ModdedNotsnufffie variants.
en.GMCM.Options.MaruBlackHair.Name: Maru Black Hair
en.GMCM.Options.MaruBlackHair.ToolTip: Makes Maru's ModdedLavender variant have black undyed hair instead of a pink ombre dye. Doesn't affect the Vanilla and ModdedNotsnufffie variants.
en.GMCM.Options.SebPiercings.Name: Seb Piercings
en.GMCM.Options.SebPiercings.ToolTip: Gives Sebastian lip and ear piercings. Can't be used if Sebastian's LightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.SebGlasses.Name: Seb Glasses
en.GMCM.Options.SebGlasses.ToolTip: Gives Sebastian glasses. If 'dynamic' is selected, he will only wear them in private. Can't be used if Sebastian's LightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.ScienceHouseEdits.Name: Robin's House Edits
en.GMCM.Options.NonbinarySebastian.Name: Nonbinary Sebastian
en.GMCM.Options.NonbinarySebastian.ToolTip: Selects whether or not DSV will include additional dialogue lines for Sebastian discussing a nonbinary gender identity.
en.GMCM.Title.ShaneMainOptions.Name: Main Options
en.GMCM.Options.ShaneVariant.Name: Shane Variant
en.GMCM.Options.ShaneLightweightConfig.Name: Shane Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.MarnieVariant.Name: Marnie Variant
en.GMCM.Options.JasVariant.Name: Jas Variant
en.GMCM.Options.JasLightweightConfig.Name: Jas Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Title.ShaneAdditionalOptions.Name: Additional Options
en.GMCM.Options.ShaneSelfCare.Name: Shane Self-Care
en.GMCM.Options.ShaneSelfCare.ToolTip: Chooses whether Shane dresses neatly, messily, or if his appearance changes dynamically as his story progresses. The 'dynamic' option can't be used if ShaneLightweightConfig is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.Messy.Name: Messy
en.GMCM.Options.Neat.Name: Neat
en.GMCM.Options.ShanePunkAccessories.Name: Shane Punk Accessories
en.GMCM.Options.ShanePunkAccessories.ToolTi: Chooses whether Shane will sometimes have minor punk accessories such as earrings, wristbands, and eyeliner after seeing Emily's clothing therapy event. Can only be used if Shane's LightweightConfig option is set to 'full'.
en.GMCM.Options.MarnieDynamicOutfits.Name: Marnie Dynamic Outfits
en.GMCM.Options.MarnieDynamicOutfits.ToolTi: Toggles whether Marnie will use her full wardrobe or wear different outfit styles depending on her schedule. Can't be used if Marnie's LightweightConfig option is set to 'ultralight'. Check the website for more info.
en.GMCM.Options.MarnieCharacterSmile.Name: Marnie Character Smile
en.GMCM.Options.MarnieCharacterSmile.ToolTi: Chooses whether the character/overworld sprites for Marnie's vanilla variant will have a visible smile visible like the default game or if her sprites will be blank-faced like the other character sprites.
en.GMCM.Options.ShaneWeddingOutfit.Name: Shane Wedding Outfit
en.GMCM.Options.AnimalShopEdits.Name: Shane's House Edits
en.GMCM.Title.WillyMainOptions.Name: Main Options
en.GMCM.Options.WillyVariant.Name: Willy Variant
en.GMCM.Options.Tongan.Name: Tongan
en.GMCM.Options.TonganDisabled.Name: Tongan Disabled
en.GMCM.Options.Disabled.Name: Vanilla Disabled
en.GMCM.Options.WillyLightweightConfig.Name: Willy Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.ClintVariant.Name: Clint Variant
en.GMCM.Options.ClintLightweightConfig.Name: Clint Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Options.LinusVariant.Name: Linus Variant
en.GMCM.Options.LinusLightweightConfig.Name: Linus Lightweight Config
en.GMCM.Title.WillyAdditionalOptions.Name: Additional Options
en.GMCM.Options.WillySpiritsEve.Name: Willy At Spirit's Eve
en.GMCM.Options.WillySpiritsEve.ToolTip: Chooses whether or not Willy will attend the Spirit's Eve festival, as he does not attend in vanilla.
en.GMCM.Options.ClintScar.Name: Clint Scar
en.GMCM.Options.ClintScar.ToolTip: Chooses whether or not Clint's Modded variant has facial scars. Does not affect his Vanilla variant.
en.GMCM.Options.ClintBeard.Name: Clint Beard
en.GMCM.Options.ClintBeard.ToolTip: Chooses whether or not Clint has a beard. Can't be used if ClintLightweightConfig is set to 'ultralight'.
en.GMCM.Options.LinusEventChanges.Name: Linus Event Changes
en.GMCM.Options.LinusEventChanges.ToolTip: Chooses whether or not events with Linus are edited to also include Marigold. Does not affect his Vanilla variant.
en.GMCM.Title.MedinaquirinPinzolHarvey.Name: No Mustache Vanilla Harvey
en.GMCM.Options.AddonHarveyGlasses.Name: Harvey Glasses
en.GMCM.Options.AddonHarveyGlasses.ToolTip: Chooses whether or not Harvey will wear glasses.
en.GMCM.Title.AirynJodi.Name: Brunette or Strawberry Blonde Vanilla Jodi
en.GMCM.Options.AddonJodiHair.Name: Jodi Hair Color
en.GMCM.Options.AddonJodiHair.ToolTip: Chooses whether Jodi has brunette hair, matching her vanilla portrait, or strawberry blonde hair, matching her vanilla sprite.
en.GMCM.Options.Brunette.Name: Brunette
en.GMCM.Options.StrawberryBlonde.Name: Strawberry Blonde
en.GMCM.Title.BittybeePenny.Name: Brunette Penny
en.GMCM.Options.AddonPennyEyes.Name: Penny Eye Color
en.GMCM.Options.AddonPennyEyes.ToolTip: Chooses whether Penny has brown or green eyes.
en.GMCM.Options.Brown.Name: Brown
en.GMCM.Options.Green.Name: Green
en.GMCM.Title.AirynWizard.Name: Handsome Mature Wizard
en.GMCM.Options.AddonWizardVariant.Name: Handsome Mature Wizard Variant
en.GMCM.Options.AddonWizardVariant.ToolTip: Choose which version of Airyn's Handsome Mature Wizard you would like to use. 'Vanilla' matches the default version from the original game, while 'Modded' matches DSV's Modded variant. Check the website for more info.
